data.what_is:
The Distribion Distributed Marketing Platform (DMP) is a multi-channel corporate marketing automation solution that empowers local sales and marketing agents to access, personalize and send pre-approved brand campaigns. Packaged in a user-friendly interface, marketers now have a single, accessible platform to house all marketing assets, execute end-to-end marketing campaigns and measure impact with real-time analytics and reporting tools. Visit our website, www.distribion.com
to learn more and request a live demo.
data.product_description: Distribion is a leading provider of SaaS, cloud-based distributed marketing automation software. The DMP, Distribion's signature product, enables organizations to more efficiently manage and measure their distributed, multi-channel marketing strategies with a single integrated platform while optimizing lead and customer engagement.Distribion is a leading provider of SaaS, cloud-based distributed marketing automation software. The DMP, Distribion's signature product, enables organizations to more efficiently manage and measure their distributed, multi-channel marketing strategies with a single integrated platform while optimizing lead and customer engagement.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Distribion?
Knowing that businesses have particular business demands, it is prudent they avoid subscribing to a one-size-fits-all, ideal system. However, it would be difficult to try to stumble on such an app even among well-known software solutions. The reasonable thing to undertake is to take note of the different essential aspects that demand deliberation such as crucial features, pricing, technical skill capability of staff, company size, etc.

What do you dislike about Distribion?
The fact that you can't test the tool yourself, have to go through a pre-interview and don't know how much you're going to pay is a deterrent for most companies today. Distribion doesn't seem to care, as they go to a segment of large company customers who are looking for a pre-consultancy.

What problems is Distribion solving and how is that benefiting you?
All-in-one software to manage your online marketing actions, whether you are an online store or another type of online business.

Its ease of use makes it well above average and its detailed metrics are also a strength.

initial_reviews.review_title: Great tool to automate your marketing process.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Distribion?
I mostly like that it gives a sudden increase in sales and profits, but it also makes your brand look more potent among your competitors. Besides, I mainly like Distribion's support via online, business hours, and 24/7 live support. And Distribion provides training in the form of documentation, live online. Distribion offers a free trial which is very important to explore its functionality without pay for it. It allows not only sending traditional email marketing campaigns, but also automated campaigns and creating action flows to send certain emails when an action occurs.

What do you dislike about Distribion?
I do not have dislikes, just as I said above there are many perfect features that you can not appreciate and say that it is not a good product. And the only thing that I want to point out it increases your probability of being more visible. It allows not only sending traditional email marketing campaigns, but also automated campaigns and creating action flows to send certain emails when an action occurs.

Recommendations to others considering Distribion:
I highly recommend Distribion for its perfect features such as control of centralized marketing actions, monitoring, and management of multi-channel campaigns, email marketing, social media campaigns, Customized templates, and so on. All-in-one software may manage your online marketing actions, whether you are an online store or another type of online business.

What problems is Distribion solving and how is that benefiting you?
I have already said it increases your probability of being more visible. It keeps your audience engaged on social media platforms like Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn.
Distribion takes care of your marketing assets like marketing content, imagery, videos, and files and allows you safe access whenever needed.

initial_reviews.review_title: It is a powerful email marketing platform
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Distribion?
Extremely robust with extraordinary tracking abilities. Lots of templates to choose from. Customizations are possible as well. Manages large lists of recipients/audiences well.

What do you dislike about Distribion?
Not user-friendly and does not have a drag and drop feature, which we can see in most of our peers. The process of creating the email. I felt it was challenging.

Recommendations to others considering Distribion:
Great and efficient in time saving, Manages large lists of recipients/audiences well.

What problems is Distribion solving and how is that benefiting you?
Distribion has added a lot of automation to the day to day tasks. With distribution, the hard work is taken out of the equation after the initial setup is complete.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Distribion?
The app's impressive monitoring and reporting capabilities are extremely powerful. It integrates seamlessly with CRM, which is essential to our organization. It comes pre-loaded with templates out of the box.

What do you dislike about Distribion?
It is not very user-friendly. It is also difficult to use without extensive training. Finally, the platform is not very intuitive.

What problems is Distribion solving and how is that benefiting you?
You can also make your emails stand out by creating a specially designed template.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Distribion?
What I enjoy most about Distribion is the fact that it takes a lot of the manual work out of the way I used to market material to potential prospects. Things are so much more stream lined and most of the distribution has become a second thought now that Distribion takes care of most of the work for me.

What do you dislike about Distribion?
Distribion's platform is a lot to digest at first. I think I had a slightly more difficult time learning the ins and outs of the platform for Distribion than I would have had for other options.

What problems is Distribion solving and how is that benefiting you?
Distribion has added a lot of automation to the day to day tasks. It is no longer necessary to sit through hours of manually coding distribution channels for our marketing. With distribion, the hard work is taken out of the equation after the initial set up is complete.

Things are so much more stream lined and most of the distribution has become a second thought now that Distribion takes care of most of the work for me.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Distribion solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Distribion has added a lot of automation to the day to day tasks. It is no longer necessary to sit through hours of manually coding distribution channels for our marketing. With distribion, the hard work is taken out of the equation after the initial set up is complete.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Distribion?
Relatively straight-forward. Making templates is easy enough (though slightly time consuming). Love that it autosaves so you don't lose your work.

What do you dislike about Distribion?
Not always intuitive, took me a second to figure out how to find past email results. Wish that editing and adding in new contacts was a little more straightforward.

What problems is Distribion solving and how is that benefiting you?
Mass email marketing for multiple different groups and purposes. Allows for multiple template options.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Distribion?
review_question_answers.answer: Relatively straight-forward. Making templates is easy enough (though slightly time consuming). Love that it autosaves so you don't lose your work.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Distribion?
review_question_answers.answer: Not always intuitive, took me a second to figure out how to find past email results. Wish that editing and adding in new contacts was a little more straightforward.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Distribion solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Mass email marketing for multiple different groups and purposes. Allows for multiple template options.

initial_reviews.review_title: Not the worst email marketing platform but could use some improvements.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Distribion?
I like that I have the ability to go in and edit the HTML and can customizing my own templates. I also like that I can schedule emails and review past campaign results.

What do you dislike about Distribion?
I have had many issues while trying to add photos to the email body and then suddenly I cannot exit out of the pop-up and lose all unsaved work in the email. VERY frustrating. I believe this only happens when I pull the browser into "half screen" mode. But doesn't fix when expanded/contracted normally.

What problems is Distribion solving and how is that benefiting you?
Email marketing, newsletters, press releases, etc. It's helpful while sending out mass emails to stakeholders, staff, consumers, and media.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Distribion?
review_question_answers.answer: I like that I have the ability to go in and edit the HTML and can customizing my own templates. I also like that I can schedule emails and review past campaign results.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Distribion?
review_question_answers.answer: I have had many issues while trying to add photos to the email body and then suddenly I cannot exit out of the pop-up and lose all unsaved work in the email. VERY frustrating. I believe this only happens when I pull the browser into "half screen" mode. But doesn't fix when expanded/contracted normally.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Distribion solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Email marketing, newsletters, press releases, etc. It's helpful while sending out mass emails to stakeholders, staff, consumers, and media.

What do you dislike about Distribion?

What problems is Distribion solving and how is that benefiting you?
Mass emailing/marketing and e-invites

The app's impressive monitoring and reporting capabilities are extremely powerful. It integrates seamlessly with CRM, which is essential to our organization. It comes pre-loaded with templates out of the box.

What do you dislike about Distribion?
It is not very user-friendly. It is also difficult to use without extensive training. Finally, the platform is not very intuitive.

What problems is Distribion solving and how is that benefiting you?
You can also make your emails stand out by creating a specially designed template.

all_reviews.review_content:

Extremely robust with great tracking abilities. Lots of templates to choose from.  Customization is possible as well.

What do you dislike about Distribion?
Not user-friendly and does not have drag and drop facility

Tracking is easy along with a lot of traffic on the website.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Distribion?
What I enjoy most about Distribion is the fact that it takes a lot of the manual work out of the way I used to market material to potential prospects. Things are so much more stream lined and most of the distribution has become a second thought now that Distribion takes care of most of the work for me.

What do you dislike about Distribion?
Distribion's platform is a lot to digest at first. I think I had a slightly more difficult time learning the ins and outs of the platform for Distribion than I would have had for other options.

What problems is Distribion solving and how is that benefiting you?
Distribion has added a lot of automation to the day to day tasks. It is no longer necessary to sit through hours of manually coding distribution channels for our marketing. With distribion, the hard work is taken out of the equation after the initial set up is complete.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Distribion?
Relatively straight-forward. Making templates is easy enough (though slightly time consuming). Love that it autosaves so you don't lose your work.

What do you dislike about Distribion?
Not always intuitive, took me a second to figure out how to find past email results. Wish that editing and adding in new contacts was a little more straightforward.

What problems is Distribion solving and how is that benefiting you?
Mass email marketing for multiple different groups and purposes. Allows for multiple template options.

all_reviews.review_title: Not the worst email marketing platform but could use some improvements.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Distribion?
I like that I have the ability to go in and edit the HTML and can customizing my own templates. I also like that I can schedule emails and review past campaign results.

What do you dislike about Distribion?
I have had many issues while trying to add photos to the email body and then suddenly I cannot exit out of the pop-up and lose all unsaved work in the email. VERY frustrating. I believe this only happens when I pull the browser into "half screen" mode. But doesn't fix when expanded/contracted normally.

What problems is Distribion solving and how is that benefiting you?
Email marketing, newsletters, press releases, etc. It's helpful while sending out mass emails to stakeholders, staff, consumers, and media.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Distribion?
review_question_answers.answer: I like that I have the ability to go in and edit the HTML and can customizing my own templates. I also like that I can schedule emails and review past campaign results.

review_question_answers.answer: I have had many issues while trying to add photos to the email body and then suddenly I cannot exit out of the pop-up and lose all unsaved work in the email. VERY frustrating. I believe this only happens when I pull the browser into "half screen" mode. But doesn't fix when expanded/contracted normally.
